author: profd2004
title: Simple fund management DAO SDK
description: SDKs that make it easy for builders to easily build quality tools and solutions are still limited.
solution: An opensource self-hosted or Dandelion powered typescript SDK for creating a fund management DAO. Rules DSL that govern money in and out.
experience: 14+ Yrs Software & Cloud Engineering, Blockchain development, business consulting, world languages, technical writing, teaching.
